actions.text: Referred to House Committee on Appropriations.
Reported to House from the Committee on Appropriations, H. Rept. 94-191.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.
Referred jointly to Senate Committees on Appropriations; and the Budget.
Referred jointly to Senate Committees on Labor and Public Welfare; and the District of Columbia.
Reported to Senate from the Committee on Appropriations with amendment, S. Rept. 94-175.
House agreed to certain Senate amendment.
House disagreed to certain Senate amendment.

official_title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority recommended in the message of the President of April 18, 1975 (H. Doc. 94-109) transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.

summary.as: House agreed to Senate amendment with amendment
summary.text: (House agreed to certain Senate amendment) Makes the following recissions of budget authority contained in the message of the President of April 18, 1975, pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974: (1) appropriations provided for activities under section 314(e) of the Public Health Service Act for fiscal year 1975 are recinded in the amount of $1,080,000, and for activities under title X of the Public Health Service Act for fiscal year 1975, as amended, are recinded in the amount of $543,000; (2) appropriations provided for construction under section 201 of the Community Mental Health Centers Act for fiscal year 1975, as amended, are recinded in the amount of $14,250,000; and (3) recinds in the amount of $2,000,000 the unobligated balance of funds appropriated for grants under the Department of Health, Education, and Welfare Appropriation Act, 1972.

titles.title: A bill to rescind certain budget authority recommended in the message of the President of April 18, 1975 (H. Doc. 94-109) transmitted pursuant to the Impoundment Control Act of 1974.
